descriptions.typescript-cascade-preventer: Prevents cascading TypeScript errors by mapping impact zones before type changes
descriptions.geoffrey-pattern-validator: Enforces the Geoffrey Pattern workflow with deterministic validation
descriptions.react-three-fiber-specialist: R3F expert for 3D components, performance, and Three.js patterns
descriptions.graphics-debugger: Diagnoses and fixes visual artifacts, flickering, and rendering issues
descriptions.millos-architecture-guard: Ensures architectural consistency and pattern compliance
descriptions.ai-integration-specialist: Handles Gemini API integration and AI decision systems

commands.validate: Run full Geoffrey Pattern validation suite
commands.find-usages: Find all usages of a symbol before modifying
commands.zone-audit: Audit machine positions against zone layout
commands.review-change: Review recent changes against quality standards
commands.cascade-check: Assess cascade risk before type changes
